price: Inni Allaahdha, Isa malee dhugaan gabbaramaan hin jiru. Faaruun hundi duraafii (addunyaafi) booda (Aakhiraa) keessatti kan Isaati. Murtiinis kan Isaati, Garuma Isaa qofa deebifamtu.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ لَهُ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ فِي ٱلۡأُولَىٰ وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۖ وَلَهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمُ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa lahu al-ḥamdu fī al-ūlā wal-ākhirati walahu al-ḥuk'mu wa-ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
